theorems.name: imo_1962_p2
theorems.statement:
∀ (x : ℝ)
  (h₀ : 0 ≤ 3 - x)
  (h₁ : 0 ≤ x + 1)
  (h₂ : 1 / 2 < Real.sqrt (3 - x) - Real.sqrt (x + 1)), -1 ≤ x ∧ x < 1 - Real.sqrt 31 / 8

theorems.name: imo_1968_p5_1
theorems.statement:
∀ (a : ℝ)
  (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₀ : 0 < a)
  (h₁ : ∀ x, f (x + a) = 1 / 2 + Real.sqrt (f x - (f x)^2))
  (h₂ : ∀ x, 1 / 2 ≤ f x ∧ f x ≤ 1), ∃ b > 0, ∀ x, f (x + b) = f x

theorems.name: imo_1969_p2
theorems.statement:
∀ (m n : ℝ)
  (k : ℕ)
  (a : ℕ → ℝ)
  (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₁ : ∀ x, f x = Finset.sum (Finset.range k) fun i => ((Real.cos (a i + x)) / (2^i)))
  (h₂ : f m = 0)
  (h₃ : f n = 0)
  (h₄: Finset.sum (Finset.range k) (fun i => (((cos (a i)) / (2 ^ i)))) ≠ 0), ∃ t : ℤ, m - n = t * π

theorems.name: imo_1974_p3
theorems.statement: ∀ (n : ℕ), ¬ 5 ∣ ∑ k ∈ Finset.range (n + 1), (Nat.choose (2 * n + 1) (2 * k + 1)) * (2^(3 * k))

theorems.name: imo_1978_p5
theorems.statement:
∀ (n : ℕ)
  (f : ℕ → ℕ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (m : ℕ), 0 < m → 0 < f m)
  (h₁ : ∀ (p q : ℕ), 0 < p → 0 < q → p ≠ q → f p ≠ f q)
  (h₂ : 0 < n), (∑ k ∈ Finset.Icc 1 n, (1 : ℝ) / k) ≤ ∑ k ∈ Finset.Icc 1 n, ((f k):ℝ) / k ^ 2

theorems.name: imo_1984_p6
theorems.statement:
∀ (a b c d k m : ℕ)
  (h₀ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c ∧ 0 < d)
  (h₁ : Odd a ∧ Odd b ∧ Odd c ∧ Odd d)
  (h₂ : a < b ∧ b < c ∧ c < d)
  (h₃ : a * d = b * c)
  (h₄ : a + d = (2:ℕ)^k)
  (h₅ : b + c = 2^m), a = 1

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ x, f 1 x = x)
  (h₁ : ∀ n x, 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / n)), ∃! a, ∀ n, 0 < n → 0 < f n a ∧ f n a < f (n + 1) a ∧ f (n + 1) a < 1

theorems.name: imo_2022_p5
theorems.statement:
∀ (a b p : ℕ)
  (h₀: 0 < a ∧ 0 < b)
  (hp: Nat.Prime p)
  (h₁: a^p = Nat.factorial b + p), (a, b, p) = (2, 2, 2) ∨ (a, b, p) = (3, 4, 3)

theorems.name: imo_2023_p4
theorems.statement:
∀ (x : ℕ → ℝ)
  (a : ℕ → ℝ)
  (hxp: ∀ (i: ℕ), (0 < x i) )
  (hx: ∀ (i j: ℕ), (i ≠ j) → (x i ≠ x j) )
  (h₀: ∀ (n:ℕ), (1 ≤ n ∧ n ≤ 2023) →
  a n = Real.sqrt ( (Finset.sum (Finset.Ico 1 (n + 1)) fun (k : ℕ) => (x k))
  * (Finset.sum (Finset.Ico 1 (n + 1)) fun (k : ℕ) => 1 / (x k)) ) )
  (h₁: ∀ (n:ℕ), (1 ≤ n ∧ n ≤ 2023) → ∃ (kz:ℤ), (a n = ↑kz )), (3034 ≤ a 2023)
